Design specific primer

design_specific_primer.Rd

Design specific primer

Usage

design_specific_primer(
  fasta_file,
  minLength = 20,
  maxLength = 25,
  minProductSize = 150,
  maxProductSize = 500,
  verbose = FALSE
)

Arguments

fasta_file

fasta format

minLength

primer min length

maxLength

primer max length

minProductSize

product min length

maxProductSize

product max length

verbose

if TRUE, will print progress during the run

Value

primers

On this page
